library(RefManageR)

print(bib, .opts= list(bib.style = "numeric", max.names=99))

bib <- ReadBib("data/citations_2016.bib", check = "error")
print(bib, .opts= list(style ="citation", bib.style = "authoryear", max.names=99))

out <- data.frame(print(bib, .opts= list(style ="citation", bib.style = "numeric", max.names=199)))

oldfile <- read.delim("data/gs_pub.txt")  

PrintBibliography(bib)

write.table(out, "data/gs_pub.txt", sep="\t", quote=FALSE)
